title: Tales.From.The.Crypt-Bordello.Of.Blood.&.Demon.Knight
description:
Tales from the Crypt: Demon Knight (1995) 

Overview 

Directors:Ernest R. Dickerson 
Gilbert Adler 

Writing credits: Ethan Reiff & Cyrus Voris & Mark Bishop 

John Kassir ... Crypt Keeper (voice) 

Billy Zane ... The Collector 

William Sadler ... Brayker 

Jada Pinkett Smith ... Jeryline (as Jada Pinkett) 

Brenda Bakke ... Cordelia 

CCH Pounder ... Irene 

Dick Miller ... Uncle Willy 

Thomas Haden Church ... Roach 

Tagline: Ready for your deadtime story ? 

Plot Outline: Brayker is a man who carries the last of seven keys, special containers which held the blood of Christ and were scattered across the universe to prevent the forces of evil from taking over. If The Collector gets the last key, the universe will fall into Chaos, and he has been tracking Brayker all the way to a small inn in a nowhere town. And now the final battle for the universe begins... 

Bordello of Blood (1996) 

Overview 

Director:Gilbert Adler 

Writing credits: Bob Gale & Robert Zemeckis(story) 
A L Katz & Gilbert Adler(screenplay) 

John Kassir ... The Crypt Keeper (voice) 

Dennis Miller ... Rafe Guttman 

Erika Eleniak ... Katherine Verdoux 

Angie Everhart ... Lillith 

Chris Sarandon ... Rev. &#039;J.C.&#039; Current 

Corey Feldman ... Caleb Verdoux 

Aubrey Morris ... McCutcheon 

Phil Fondacaro ... Vincent Prather 

William Sadler ... The Mummy 

Plot Outline: The cryptkeeper returns to tell the story of a funeral parlor that moonlights as a vampire bordello. 

Two great movies, one great price...FREE! Enjoy. 

Here for you-TeNNReeD
